question: Show all steakhouses and seafood restaurants which were established in 1980.
sql_query1:
SELECT Restaurants.Name 
FROM Restaurants
WHERE (Restaurants.Type = "Steakhouse" OR Restaurants.Type = "Seafood Restaurant") AND Restaurants.Year_of_Establishment = 1980
sql_query2:
SELECT Restaurants.Name 
FROM Restaurants
WHERE Restaurants.Type = "Steakhouse" OR Restaurants.Type = "Seafood Restaurant" AND Restaurants.Year_of_Establishment = 1980
interpretation1: Show all the restaurants that were established in 1980 that operate either as steakhouses or seafood restaurants.
interpretation2: Show all the steakhouses, then show the seafood restaurants which have been open since 1980.
